comment: Very interesting class. I did it online and it was not over whelming. He keeps to syllabus and he answers emails fairly quickly. Highly recommend

Dean Vengroff was one of the best proffesors i have ever had. He is so informative and helpful. i learned so much by attending his classes. he asks for weekly journals about specific topics but the good thing about that is there is no wrong answer as long as you do the work. I would highly recommend talking this class.

Worst teacher I have ever had. There is a lot of work he assigns weekly that is pretty much pointless. He teaches the class as if this is the only class we were taking during a semester. Ridiculous. He also does not follow the syllabus rules or I would have dropped the class during drop/add. He posts discussions and makes them due like 2 days after

This was an extremely interesting class. Dr. Vengroff made it very enjoyable and easy. There was a group project (which is a lot of fun). Make sure you read books and come to classes to do well on the exams. There is one paper on a policy. Exams are online and open-book. If you don't know anything about Canada, this is the class you should take.

Comparative Politics. He gives great explanations and you know exactly what to expect from the tests. He has a few class activities which are interesting. There is a paper in which we follow a country which he grades rather easily. Great Professor!
I cannot tell you enough how very cool Dean V's class was! great teacher!
